title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Leading IoT platform development at YakLabs (Tashkent, Uzbekistan). Architected microservices handling 8K+ concurrent users with 99.7% uptime using Python/Django, Redis caching, and PostgreSQL optimization. Built real-time WebSocket system processing 50K+ IoT events daily, implemented PyTorch-based anomaly detection reducing false alerts by 73%, and deployed multi-region AWS infrastructure with Grafana/Prometheus monitoring.

title: Software Engineer
description: Developed scalable web applications and microservices architecture at MegaDevs (Germany). Led backend development initiatives handling 15K+ daily active users, implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%, and architected Kubernetes-based infrastructure supporting 99.5% uptime. Built TypeScript/Node.js APIs processing 2M+ requests monthly with <150ms average response time.

title: Backend Developer & AI Engineer
description: Specialized in microservices architecture, API development, and AI integration as freelance developer. Built Python/Django REST APIs serving 5K+ users, implemented FastAPI services with 95% test coverage, and deployed AI-powered chatbots handling 10K+ conversations monthly. Architected PostgreSQL databases optimized for 100K+ records with sub-50ms query performance.
